body: Outlined creatures are dazzled. The spell outlines figment illusions in the burst, revealing them as such. This effect applies only to figments with a caster level equal to or less than your tier.
name: Faerie Fire, Mythic

sections.body: If you expend two uses of mythic power, each creature in the burst must succeed at a Fortitude save or be blinded for 1 round.
sections.name: Augmented (2nd)
